name: Block Busters (itch)
description:
Made for ScoreSpace Jam #8 - Theme: Balance

In this physics based game, you click on blocks to damage them. Each block has its own health, defense, and weight. Keeping the beam balanced will prove to be essential to your survival. You can upgrade either your attack or how many coins and points you earn.

All sprites, sound effects, music, coding, etc. are by me.

Made using GameMaker Studio 1.4

Sound Effects from BFXR

Music made in Soundtrap
